content.description:
Climb the unprotected slab/face to a jug, small ledge, and the base of the crack. Climb up the obvious, super fun crack to a 2 bolt anchor up and left at the top of the cliff. 

****NOTE: There is a lot of loose rock at the top of this wall. While most of the lower wall is protected from the potential rock fall from the top by a large ledge, please exercise extreme caution. Rappelling is not recommended! There is an easy descent gully on the climbers right.
content.location: from "Rounders", climb up the slab\gully on right to the base of the obvious crack in the upper right side of the wall

content.description: Climb the smooth, dark, steep slab just right of "Capture the Flag". The crux come quick, followed by super fun moves over amazing chicken head flakes
content.protection: 5 glue in protection bolts, 2 bolt anchor with Steel Carabiners

content.description: Climb the crack\face in the center of the wall past a slab crux to a bulge\headwall. climb up and over the bulge to a small ledge, then on up past a couple more bolts to anchor
content.protection: 6 glue in bolts, 2 bolt anchor with Pig Tail lower off's
content.location: Center of the wall, 10' left of "Rounders"

content.description: Climb the slab/seam up to a steep head wall, climb up the face above on LARGE chicken heads flakes/edges/ledges!
content.protection: 6 glue in bolts, 2 bolt anchor with Pig Tail lower off's

content.description: Start 10 feet right of  "Hide and Seek", climb up a face with cracks and chicken heads past bolts to a steep bulge. pass the bulge and climb the blunt arête\face to anchors
content.protection: 6 glue in protection bolts, 2 bolt anchor with steel carabiners
content.location: 10' right of "Hide and Seek" or 10' left of "Simon Says"

content.description: Climb the face and short flaring crack past chicken head flakes. Great moves, fun and interesting crux!
content.protection: 5 glue in protection bolts, 2 bolt anchor with steel Carabiners

content.description: climb up the slab/chimney past several bolts, step right onto the arête proper, climb up to a final small roof at the top below the anchor
content.protection: 6 glue in protection bolts, two bolt anchor with steel carabiners
content.location: On the left end of the Hide and Seek Wall, the prominent arete
